com.sauravyash.catalogueviewer

Class CatalogueViewer

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.sauravyash.catalogueviewer.CatalogueViewer

  • public class CatalogueViewer
extends Object
    This Class is the main thread that runs the entire program. It manages all of the windows and global variables that are used dynamically throughout the program (resource folder, working directory etc.).
    Author:
    Yash

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static CatalogueFile Catalogue
      The entire catalogue in the abstract CatalogueFile format.
      static File CataloguePath
      The path of the folder with the images and manifest file of the catalogue.
      static File ResourcesFolder
      The relative path to the folder with all of the application's resources.
      static User UserData
      The details of the user currently logged in.
      static Path WorkingDIR
      The relative directory for all of the application data to be stored.

      CatalogueViewer() 

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Static Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static void LogOut()
      This will open an instance of the login pane and clear the current user data.
      static void main(String[] args)
      The main process for the entire application.
      static void OpenCatalogueWindow()
      This will open an instance of the catalogue viewer.
      static void OpenLoginWindow()
      This will open an instance of the login pane.
      static void OpenSelectorWindow()
      This will open an instance of the ZIP file selection pane.
      static void ShutDown()
      This will clean up all of the catalogues that were opened in the session and then quit the program

    • Field Detail

      • WorkingDIR

        public static Path WorkingDIR
        The relative directory for all of the application data to be stored. It differs between operating systems. Windows: C:\Users\${current_user_name} Linux & Mac: ~/ (User Directory)

      • UserData

        public static User UserData
        The details of the user currently logged in.
